pkgmetadata.longdescription: =========================Core Federated Search App=========================Federated search backend for the curator core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_federated_search_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting-----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'oauth2_provider', 'core_federated_search_app', ]2. Include the core_federated_search_app URLconf in your project urls.py------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^o/', include('oauth2_provider.urls', namespace='oauth2_provider')), url(r'^federated/search/', include("core_federated_search_app.urls")),
